info.name: crossTrainerX
info.description:
This collection tests the API specification given for Assignment 3.
In order to run this collection, you need an environment which has the following 3 environment variables pre-defined:

app_url
- Set this to your app. E.g., when running locally set it to http://localhost:8080. When running the app on GCP. set it to https://myapp.appsport.com

invalid_boat_id
- Set it to a value that's not an ID of any boat in your project. I have set it to 1 and that should work for you as well.
- 

invalid_slip_id
- Set it to a value that's not an ID of any slip in your porject. I have set it to 1 and that should work for you as well.

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.json()["description"]).to.eq("Lift a barbell from the ground to a standing position");

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Deadlift",
  "type": "Strength",
  "secondaryType": "Legs",
  "description": "Lift a barbell from the ground to a standing position",
  "muscleGroup": "Back",
  "equipment": "barbell",
  "reps": 6,
  "sets": 5,
  "weight": 120,
  "weightClass": 3,
  "rest": 120
}

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.json()["description"]).to.eq("Lower your body as if you were sitting in a chair, then stand back up");

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Squat",
  "type": "Strength",
  "secondaryType": "Legs",
  "description": "Lower your body as if you were sitting in a chair, then stand back up",
  "muscleGroup": "Legs",
  "equipment": "dumbbells",
  "reps": 10,
  "sets": 3,
  "weight": 50,
  "weightClass": 2,
  "rest": 60
}

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.json()["description"]).to.eq("Grab the bar in front of you with your elbows resting on the bench and then perform a curl keeping your elbows in place");

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Preacher curls",
    "type": "Strength",
    "secondaryType": "Pull",
    "description": "Grab the bar in front of you with your elbows resting on the bench and then perform a curl keeping your elbows in place",
    "muscleGroup": "Biceps",
    "equipment": "Barbell, bench",
    "weightClass": 3,
    "reps": 12,
    "sets": 3,
    "weight": 40,
    "rest": 60
}

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.json()["description"]).to.eq("Grab the cable with your arms stretched out in front of you, pull it back until your elbows are behind you and then release");

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Cable rows",
    "type": "Strength",
    "secondaryType": "Pull",
    "description": "Grab the cable with your arms stretched out in front of you, pull it back until your elbows are behind you and then release",
    "muscleGroup": "Back",
    "equipment": "Cable machine",
    "weightClass": 3,
    "reps": 12,
    "sets": 3,
    "weight": 40,
    "rest": 60
}

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.json()["description"]).to.eq("Lower your body as if you were sitting in a chair, then stand back up");

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Squat",
  "type": "Strength",
  "secondaryType": "Legs",
  "description": "Lower your body as if you were sitting in a chair, then stand back up",
  "muscleGroup": "Legs",
  "equipment": "dumbbells",
  "reps": 10,
  "sets": 3,
  "weight": 50,
  "weightClass": 2,
  "rest": 60
}

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.json()["description"]).to.eq("Bend forward from the waist, reaching toward the toes");

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Forward Bend",
  "type": "Flexibility",
  "secondaryType": "Yoga",
  "description": "Bend forward from the waist, reaching toward the toes",
  "duration": 20,
  "difficulty": 2
}

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.json()["description"]).to.eq("Gently tilt your head to each side to stretch the neck muscles");

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Neck Stretch",
  "type": "Flexibility",
  "secondaryType": "Stretching",
  "description": "Gently tilt your head to each side to stretch the neck muscles",
  "duration": 15,
  "difficulty": 1
}

item.name: add exercise with invalid response MIME type 406

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.json()["Error"]).to.eq("The requested response MIME type is not supported by this endpoint");

  "name": "Bench Press",
  "type": "Strength Training",
  "description": "A reclined barbell exercise",
  "muscleGroup": "chest shoulders arms",
  "equipment": "barbell",
  "rating": 5
}
